title: The Baker DVD Rip + dvd front and label
description:
This is a dvdrip of the 2007 film The Baker, including dvd case front and dvd label.

"This ghastly vision nicely sums up the rather old fashioned style of humour running through The Baker, a movie that probably imagines it&#039;s quite an edgy black comedy but comes closer to those mock thriller serials the Two Ronnies would have sandwiched between Corbett&#039;s solo joke in a chair and the closing spoof musical number.

Milo (Lewis) is a hitman who suddenly develops a conscience. With a contract now out on him, Milo hides out in a remote Welsh village assuming the mantle of local baker in order to evade fellow killer, Bjorn (Coster-Waldau)".  

uploader rating - 7/10 (as it was funny in parts but, could have been much more)

Quality rating - 10/10

subtitles - none

language - English
